fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 1285: Endbringer, 1286: Equinox, and 1287: Eclipser will always spawn. If more than three members would be required to spawn for any reason, the fourth member is 1622: Forgotten. All remaining members are replaced by Neutral Evil roles.
- On the first night, a random member becomes the First, another the Second, and another the Third. Every following night, the Third becomes the Second, the Second the First, and the First the Third. Each member can use only the ability corresponding to their position each night.
- Members have detection immunity while the First, but lose their defense while the Third.
- When there are only two members remaining, the Third is removed from the order, and the Second is considered both the Second and the Third and can use both those abilities at once. When there's only one, they're permanently the First and can use all three abilities at once.
- Members' abilities have no negative effects against other members.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the end brought about, and your enemies erased.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:See the end brought about, and your enemies erased.
